library(spatstat)
x <- scan()
889.11 795.44 615.88 505.97 1042.32 949.39 565.68 465.18 1137.1 353.21 262.89 1983.02 1350.75 1897.97 1434.71 1732.33 1386.46 1703.11 1498.5 1584.19 87.9 1939.16 1395.33 1707.5 1398.49 1576.8 1760.33 1527.11 1453.25 1899.16 1853.02 1640.96 1758.89 1808.55 1739.78 1668.01 999.23 1700.28 1724.23 1161.43 1662.57 1472.87 687.8 1584.29 1416.35 463.52 1438.22 483.19 1363.7 1380.62

y <- scan()
73.29 89.81 106.46 130.47 136.68 137.94 168.65 181.77 185.18 193.26 224.85 242.9 263.24 274.47 281.41 280.3 285.31 279.7 288.23 303.44 303.74 306.07 307.65 310.01 323.2 326.35 328.07 336.69 340.73 343.15 345.61 362.38 365.83 398.53 430.14 448.15 448.93 452.39 458.63 470.93 481.82 493.05 506.32 515.87 524.71 532.95 541.96 566.12 581.01 613.24

p<- ppp(x, y, poly = list(x = c(75,131,208,324,430,506,604,728,819,875,949,1033,1114,1222,1325,1443,1544,1654,1748,1819,1874,1929,1987,2009,2003,1961,1899,1854,1777,1688,1605,1531,1447,1389,1345,1273,1194,1090,1008,924,836,760,719,618,510,411,347,342,311,290,292,313,365,397,456,532,635,725,800,893,981,1060,1134,1188,1308,1370,1410,1457,1538,1607,1663,1669,1616,1502,1393,1271,1161,1084,1009,888,795,697,574,428,281,149,57,32), y = c(274,215,184,143,113,90,76,58,54,63,91,121,153,196,234,267,282,282,274,245,211,188,199,225,269,309,366,401,446,489,533,568,611,625,613,589,560,535,515,503,499,497,510,535,571,649,727,747,747,734,698,654,602,570,528,502,470,442,435,433,435,446,459,473,501,513,514,494,457,422,392,379,376,367,339,296,264,236,211,176,165,165,190,233,272,304,327,317)))
unitname(p)<-list("micron","micron",0.691)
summary(p)
plot(p)


nndist(p)
setwd("F:/Data/Spatial pattern analysis")

write.table(nndist(p),"Example DG c-fos pattern.csv",sep=",")
